description: For your best everyday runs or whatever else you can dream up, with an essential dose of utility, the Multi Trails Shorts have an 8" inseam and are made of a lightweight 90% recycled polyester/10% spandex blend that breathes, wicks moisture and moves comfortably. Fair Trade Certified™ sewn.
name: Patagonia Multi Trails Shorts, 8" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: 2.5-oz 90% Prevented Ocean Plastic™ recycled polyester certified by OceanCycle and sourced from coastal communities at risk of plastic pollution
2.3-oz 100% recycled polyester double knit with miDori™ bioSoft for added wicking and softness, and HeiQ® Pure odor control
Body is made of quick-drying 90% Prevented Ocean Plastic™ recycled polyester sourced from plastic waste recovered from at-risk coastal communities and certified by OceanCycle
External drawcord for adjustability and comfort
Two zippered front pockets; one back snap pocket that shorts stuff into for easy storage and packing on the go
Light and minimal elastic waistband, with good power and recovery, provides moisture management and reduces bulk
Reflective logo on front-left hem; locker loop for hang drying; 8" inseam

specs.key: Supporting the People Who Made This Product
specs.value: Fair Trade Certified™ sewn, which means the people who made it earned a premium for their labor
